title: Mavri Aforditi, Afrodita Negra 1977 Ajita Wilson, Annik Borel, AT Savallas, Anda Vartholomeou, Pantelis Agelopou + Pavlos Flippou

sources.title: Mavri Aforditi, Afrodita Negra 1977 Ajita Wilson, Annik Borel, AT Savallas, Anda Vartholomeou, Pantelis Agelopou + Pavlos Flippou
sources.description: This movie's main claim to fame may be the number of titles it goes by: Blue Passion, Marvi Afroditi, and Afordita Negra to name a few. Some kind of heist movie with a fair bit of nudity thrown in to pad the time.
